author: Staff Reporter
text: The police on Saturday arrested a man on charges of murdering two labourers and dumping their bodies at Edappadi here on January 17. C. Annadurai (45) and Mani (55), of Erupali Pudur village, were murdered by N. Palanisamy (39) and Arthanari over enmity. The two removed the stem and roots of two palm trees and buried their bodies in it. The police arrested Palanisamy from Kerala while search was on for Arthanari.
title: Murder accused arrested
